TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ApplicationSettingsBase extends System.Configuration.SettingsBase implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public MustInherit Class ApplicationSettingsBase Inherits SettingsBase Implements INotifyPropertyChanged
public ref class ApplicationSettingsBase abstract : System::Configuration::SettingsBase, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 做為衍生實體包裝函式類別的基底類別，以實作 Windows Form 應用程式中的應用程式設定功能。

span.span: Acts as a base class for deriving concrete wrapper classes to implement the application settings feature in Window Forms applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入下列功能以網頁型應用程式所使用的類別： adds the following functionality to the class, which is used by Web-based applications: - 偵測屬性設定包裝函式，在衍生類別上的功能。The ability to detect attributes on a derived, settings wrapper class. 支援宣告式模型用於包裝函式的類別屬性，稍後會加以說明。 supports the declarative model used for wrapper class properties, as described later. - 較高層級和方法。Higher-level and methods. - 您可以處理以確保正確性個別設定額外的驗證事件。Additional validation events that you can handle to ensure the correctness of individual settings. 在應用程式設定架構中，若要存取一組設定屬性的您必須衍生具體的包裝函式類別從。In the application settings architecture, to access a group of settings properties you need to derive a concrete wrapper class from . 包裝函式類別自訂如下：The wrapper class customizes in the following ways: - 對於存取每個設定屬性，對應的強型別的公用屬性就會加入至包裝函式類別。For every settings property to be accessed, a corresponding strongly typed public property is added to the wrapper class. 此屬性具有`get`和`set`存取子讀取/寫入應用程式設定，但僅限於`get`唯讀設定的存取子。This property has `get` and `set` accessors for read/write application settings, but only a `get` accessor for read-only settings. - Appropriated 的屬性必須套用至包裝函式類別的公用屬性是否設定應該支援漫遊的預設值，表示設定屬性，例如設定的範圍 （應用程式或使用者） 的特性設定，設定提供者使用，等等。Appropriated attributes must be applied to the wrapper class's public properties to indicate characteristics of the settings property, such as the setting's scope (application or user), whether the setting should support roaming, the default value for the setting, the settings provider to be used, and so on. 每一個屬性必須指定其範圍中，使用或。Each property is required to specify its scope, using either or . 應用程式範圍的設定是唯讀如果預設用。Application-scoped settings are read-only if the default is used. 類別會使用反映來偵測這些屬性在執行階段。The class uses reflection to detect these attributes at run time. 大部分的這項資訊傳遞至設定提供者層，也就是負責儲存體、 持續性格式等等。Most of this information gets passed to the settings provider layer, which is responsible for storage, persistence format, and so on. 當應用程式有多個設定包裝函式類別，每個類別定義*設定群組*。When an application has multiple settings wrapper classes, each class defines a *settings group*. 每個群組具有下列特性：Each group has the following characteristics: - 群組可以包含任何數目或類型的屬性設定。A group can contain any number or type of property settings. - 如果群組名稱不明確設定而將包裝函式類別，則，則會自動產生的名稱。If the group name is not explicitly set by the decorating the wrapper class with a , then a name is automatically generated. 根據預設，所有的用戶端應用程式使用提供儲存體。By default, all client-based applications use the to provide storage. 如果想要使用的替代設定提供者，則必須以相對應裝飾的包裝函式類別或屬性。If an alternate settings provider is desired, then the wrapper class or property must be decorated with a corresponding . 如需有關如何使用應用程式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[適用於 Windows Form 應用程式設定](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md)。For more information about using application settings, see [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用應用程式設定保存主要表單的下列屬性： 位置、 大小、 背景色彩和標題列文字。The following code example demonstrates the use of application settings to persist the following attributes of the main form: location, size, background color, and title bar text. 所有這些屬性會保存為單一應用程式中設定屬性`FormSettings`類別，名為`FormLocation`， `FormSize`，`FormBackColor`和`FormText`分別。All of these attributes are persisted as single application settings properties in the `FormSettings` class, named `FormLocation`, `FormSize`, `FormBackColor` and `FormText`, respectively. 所有以外的`FormText`和`Size`是資料繫結至其相關聯的表單屬性，而且具有預設設定值套用使用。All except for `FormText` and `Size` are data bound to their associated form properties and have a default setting value applied using . 表單包含四個子控制項具有下列名稱和函式：The form contains four child controls that have the following names and functions: - 名為按鈕`btnBackColor`用來顯示**色彩**通用對話方塊。A button named `btnBackColor` used to display the **Color** common dialog box. - 名為按鈕`btnReload`用於應用程式設定。A button named `btnReload` used to the application settings. - 名為按鈕`btnReset`用於應用程式設定。A button named `btnReset` used to the application settings. - 名為文字方塊`tbStatus`用來顯示關於此計畫的狀態資訊。A textbox named `tbStatus` used to display status information about the program. 請注意，每次執行應用程式之後，其他的句號字元會附加至表單的標題文字。Notice that after every execution of the application, an additional period character is appended to the title text of the form. 這個程式碼範例需要的表單具有名為類別`colorDialog1`，和用來控制名為`tbStatus`。This code example requires a Form with a class named `colorDialog1`, and a control with a named `tbStatus`. 此外，它需要三個物件命名`btnReload`， `btnReset`，和`btnBackColor`。Additionally, it requires three objects named `btnReload`, `btnReset`, and `btnBackColor`. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 將 類別的執行個體初始化成其預設狀態。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class to its default state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式為了在沒有任何元件，與目前的設定包裝函式類別，衍生自聯假設下運作。The default constructor was designed to work under the assumption that there is no component associated with the current settings wrapper class, which derives from . 建立包裝函式類別的執行個體時，繼承的程式碼將會自動執行下列動作：When an instance of a wrapper class is created, inherited code will automatically perform the following actions: 1. 反映類別。Reflect over the class. 2. 包裝函式上的每一個屬性標示其中一種`[UserScopedSettingAttribute]`或`[ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute]`，相對應建立。For each property on the wrapper marked with either `[UserScopedSettingAttribute]` or `[ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute]`, a corresponding is created. 3. 每個有某些根據 （選擇性） 有包裝函式的屬性，例如 預設值或設定提供者的其他屬性設定其屬性。Each has some of its properties set based on other attributes that are optionally present on the wrapper's properties, such as the default value or the settings provider. 4. 所有其他屬性會直接放入的屬性包，屬性類別。All other attributes are simply put into an attribute bag, the property of the class. 5. 所有物件加入至由屬性類別。All objects are added to a represented by the property of the class. 這個集合會接著傳遞給方法。This collection is then passed to the method. 步驟 3 先前所述，為隱含原生適用於數個屬性的屬性，特別是以下： ， ，和。As implied by step 3 mentioned previously, natively works with several property attributes, specifically the following: , , and . 所有其他設定屬性會直接傳遞給適當的基礎提供者。All other settings attributes are simply passed through to the appropriate underlying provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式相當於使用叫用的建構函式：This constructor is exactly equivalent to the constructor using the invocation: `ApplicationSettingsBase(owner, String.Empty)` 包裝函式類別具現化期間如何使用反映的相關資訊，請參閱預設建構函式。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

summary.span: 使用提供的設定索引鍵，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class using the supplied settings key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性設為值的`settingsKey`參數。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `settingsKey` parameter. 這個屬性是用於釐清設定包裝函式類別相同的應用程式定義域中的不同執行個體。This property is useful in disambiguating different instances of the settings wrapper class in the same application domain. 包裝函式類別具現化期間如何使用反映的相關資訊，請參閱預設建構函式。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

Protected Sub New (owner As IComponent, settingsKey As String)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定物件`owner`參數做為此應用程式設定類別的目前執行個體的擁有者。The object specified by the `owner` parameter acts as the owner of the current instance of this applications settings class. 包裝函式類別衍生自的設定初始化期間，擁有者的站台針對查詢。During the initialization of the settings wrapper class derived from , the owner's site is queried for a . 如果有的話，它用於原生的設定提供者的包裝函式類別，所指定的所有屬性。If one exists, it is used in preference to native settings provider for all the properties of the wrapper class, as specified by the . 這個建構函式初始化屬性設為值的`settingsKey`參數。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `settingsKey` parameter. 這個屬性是類別的用於區分不同的執行個體的包裝函式中相同的應用程式定義域時。This property is useful in disambiguating different instances of the wrapper class in the same application domain. 包裝函式類別具現化期間如何使用反映的相關資訊，請參閱預設建構函式。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Context As SettingsContext
public: virtual property System::Configuration::SettingsContext ^ Context { System::Configuration::SettingsContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與設定群組相關的應用程式設定內容。

span.span: Gets the application settings context associated with the settings group.
A associated with the settings group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個設定包裝函式類別衍生自都有一個與其相關聯的內容。Each settings wrapper class derived from has a context associated with it. 內容會傳遞給每個屬性的設定提供者來識別如何使用屬性。The context is passed to the settings provider for each property to identify how the property is used. 內容因此作為提示，以協助判斷如何保存相關聯的應用程式設定值的設定提供者。Context therefore acts as a hint to help the settings provider determine how best to persist the associated application settings values. 相反地，屬性可讓設定提供者，以釐清具有相同的包裝函式類別的多個執行個體。In contrast, the property enables the settings provider to disambiguate multiple instances of the same wrapper class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用於搭配方法在移轉期間新版應用程式安裝的應用程式設定。The method is often used in conjunction with the method when migrating application settings during the installation of a new version of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，也稱為索引子，例行地用在設定包裝函式類別衍生自。The property, also known as the indexer, is routinely used in the settings wrapper class derived from . 將包裝函式類別的公用屬性繫結到對應的設定屬性。 binds the public property of the wrapper class to the corresponding settings property. 會引發多個事件，根據正在執行的作業： raises several events depending on the operation being performed: - 擷取屬性時，第一次就會引發事件。The first time a property is retrieved, the event is raised. - 當屬性設定時，就會引發事件。When a property is set, the event is raised. 如果此處理常式並不會取消事件，則會在設定屬性值和就會引發事件。If the handler does not cancel the event, then the property value is set and the event is raised.

exception.span: 沒有與目前包裝函式相關的屬性，或找不到指定屬性。

span.span: There are no properties associated with the current wrapper or the specified property could not be found.
An attempt was made to set a read-only property.

exception.span: 在設定作業期間，提供之值的型別與設定屬性不相容。

span.span: The value supplied is of a type incompatible with the settings property, during a set operation.
The configuration file could not be parsed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnPropertyChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPropertyChanged(object sender, class System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnPropertyChanged (sender As Object, e As PropertyChangedEventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnPropertyChanged(System::Object ^ sender, System::ComponentModel::PropertyChangedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The source of the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As SettingsPropertyCollection

summary.span: 取得包裝函式中設定屬性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of settings properties in the wrapper.

value.span: ，包含目前包裝函式中使用的所有 物件。

span.span: A containing all the objects used in the current wrapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `get`的存取子屬性會反映對中繼資料的設定包裝函式類別，衍生自，若要以動態方式判斷可用的應用程式設定屬性的集合。The `get` accessor of the property reflects over the metadata of the settings wrapper class, which is derived from , to dynamically determine the set of available application settings properties. 原生類別可辨識的應用程式設定，例如其名稱、 屬性型別、 設定提供者、 預設值的某些特性閱讀唯一的狀態，並序列化喜好設定。The class natively recognizes certain characteristics of an application setting, such as its name, property type, settings provider, default value, read only status, and a serialization preference. 這些特性會鏡射中做為屬性類別。These characteristics are mirrored as properties in the class. 設定屬性的所有其他屬性都只傳遞至其相關聯的設定提供者。All other attributes of the settings property are just passed through to its associated settings provider.

exception.span: 找不到相關的設定提供者，或其執行個體化已失敗。

span.span: The associated settings provider could not be found or its instantiation failed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PropertyChanged As PropertyChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於應用程式設定屬性值變更之後。

span.span: Occurs after the value of an application settings property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過設定屬性變更時，會引發事件`set`的存取子方法，或還原時進行呼叫的每個屬性或方法。The event is raised when a settings property is changed through the `set` accessor of the method, or for every property that is restored when a call is made to the or methods. 沒有對應的`PropertyChanging`這個事件類別; 相反地，請參閱 < 事件。There is no corresponding `PropertyChanging` event for this class; instead, see the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property PropertyValues As SettingsPropertyValueCollection

summary.span: 取得屬性值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of property values.
A of property values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Providers As SettingsProviderCollection

summary.span: 取得包裝函式使用之應用程式設定提供者的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of application settings providers used by the wrapper.

value.span: ，包含目前設定包裝函式之設定屬性使用的所有 物件。

span.span: A containing all the objects used by the settings properties of the current settings wrapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 判斷何種設定提供者由設定包裝函式類別或個別設定屬性。The determines what setting provider is used by a settings wrapper class or an individual setting property. 如果未指定此屬性，用戶端應用程式會使用。If this attribute is not specified, a client application will use the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reload() cil managed

summary.span: 重新整理持續性儲存體 (Persistent Storage) 的應用程式設定屬性值。

span.span: Refreshes the application settings property values from persistent storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會清除目前所快取的屬性值，在後續存取時，造成重新載入這些值從永續性儲存體。The method clears the currently cached property values, causing a reload of these values from persistent storage when they are subsequently accessed. 這個方法會執行下列動作：This method performs the following actions: - 它藉由清除所表示的集合會清除目前所快取的屬性屬性。It clears the currently cached properties by clearing the collection represented by the property. - 它會引發事件的每個成員集合。It raises the event for every member of the collection. 相反在於前者會載入的最後一個集合的已儲存的應用程式設定值，而後者會載入儲存的預設值。 contrasts with in that the former will load the last set of saved application settings values, whereas the latter will load the saved default values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法主體中叫用名為按鈕的事件處理常式`btnReload`。The following code example shows the method being invoked in the body of the event handler for a button named `btnReload`. 由於這個呼叫，應用程式設定的目前儲存的值會重新載入至其對應的屬性。As a result of this call, the currently stored values for the application settings are reloaded into their corresponding properties. 完整的程式碼範例會列在類別概觀。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#6)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 將保存的應用程式設定值還原至其對應的預設屬性。

span.span: Restores the persisted application settings values to their corresponding default properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會還原目前保存每個應用程式設定的值覆寫使用者範圍的設定屬性。The method overwrites the user-scoped settings properties by restoring the currently persisted value of each application settings. 這個方法會執行下列動作：This method performs the following actions: - 它會呼叫每個設定提供者支援這個選擇性的方法上的方法。It calls the method on every settings provider that supports this optional method. - 它會呼叫強制重新整理設定的屬性值的方法。It calls the method to force a refresh of the settings property values. 相反在於前者會載入的最後一個集合的已儲存的應用程式設定值，而後者會載入儲存的預設值。 contrasts with in that the former will load the last set of saved application settings values, whereas the latter will load the saved default values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法主體中叫用名為按鈕的事件處理常式`btnReset`。The following code example shows the method being invoked in the body of the event handler for a button named `btnReset`. 由於這個呼叫，應用程式設定的預存的預設值，會重新載入至其對應的屬性。As a result of this call, the stored default values for the application settings are reloaded into their corresponding properties. 完整的程式碼範例會列在類別概觀。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

span.span: The configuration file could not be parsed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 儲存應用程式設定屬性的目前值。

span.span: Stores the current values of the application settings properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法寫入其相關聯的資料存放區中的每個設定屬性的目前值。The method writes the current value of each settings property to its associated data store. 每一個屬性，這個方法會呼叫相關聯的設定提供者上的方法。For each property, this method calls the method on the associated settings provider. 這個方法與基底類別實作的便會產生前的值會寫入事件。This method differs from the base class implementation in that it raises the event before the values are written. 如果所定義的唯一設定應用程式範圍的設定，沒有任何影響，並傳回沒有錯誤，如果使用預設值來呼叫。If the only settings defined are application-scoped settings, will have no effect and return no error if called with the default . 只會儲存使用者範圍設定。 only saves user-scoped settings. > [!IMPORTANT] > 沒有對應的 Load 方法，因為在包裝函式類別初始設定期間自動載入應用程式設定的值。There is no corresponding Load method because the values of application settings are automatically loaded during wrapper class initialization. 相反地，這些值都不會自動儲存應用程式結束時。In contrast, these values are not automatically saved when an application ends. 因此，您必須明確呼叫方法，將目前的應用程式設定值。Therefore, you must explicitly call the method to persist the current values of the application settings. 這通常在執行事件處理常式的主要或包含。This is typically performed in the event handler of the primary or containing . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法呼叫從主要表單的事件處理常式。The following code example shows the method being called from the event handler for the primary form. 這個方法也會將額外的週期附加至相關聯表單的設定屬性屬性。This method also appends an extra period to the settings property that is associated with the form's property. 完整的程式碼範例會列在類別概觀。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingChanging As SettingChangingEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於應用程式設定屬性值變更之前。

span.span: Occurs before the value of an application settings property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過變更應用程式設定值屬性之前，就會發生事件方法。The event occurs before an application setting value property is changed through the method. 此事件就不會引發的時機或呼叫的方法。This event is not raised when the or methods are called. 您可以透過取消事件資料類別。 can be canceled through the event data class. 您通常會使用事件，以處理個別的設定屬性的立即驗證。You typically use the event to handle immediate validation of an individual settings property. 如需有關驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 驗證應用程式設定](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-validate-application-settings.md)。For more information about validation, see [How to: Validate Application Settings](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-validate-application-settings.md). 沒有對應的`SettingChanged`這個事件類別; 相反地，請參閱 < 事件。There is no corresponding `SettingChanged` event for this class; instead, see the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範類型物件的事件處理常式`FormSettings`，其包裝函式類別衍生自。The following code example shows the event handler for object of type `FormSettings`, which is a wrapper class derived from . 處理常式會將事件資訊顯示在文字方塊中，名為`tbStatus`。The handler displays the event information in a textbox named `tbStatus`. 完整的程式碼範例會列在類別概觀。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SettingsKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式設定群組的設定索引鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the settings key for the application settings group.

value.span: ，包含目前設定群組的設定索引鍵。

span.span: A containing the settings key for the current settings group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，可讓用戶端程式碼，在特定的設定提供者，釐清具有相同的應用程式設定類別的多個執行個體。The property is provided to enable client code, and in particular the settings provider, to disambiguate between multiple instances of the same application settings class. 除非設定包裝函式類別設計為使用單一子句模式，可以有多個相同的應用程式設定類別中的單一應用程式執行個體。Unless the settings wrapper class is designed using the singleton pattern, there can be multiple instances of the same application settings class in a single application. 值應該依據的屬性值要如何共用設定。The value of should be set according to how the property values are intended to be shared. - 如果設定內容包裝函式要在相同的應用程式，然後包裝函式的所有執行個體之間共用應該在所有執行個體具有相同的值。If the settings properties of the wrapper are intended to be shared across all instances of the wrapper in the same application, then should have the same value in all of the instances. 這是預設行為的類別。This is the default behavior of the class. - 如果設定內容包裝函式要作為每個執行個體，然後應該有唯一的值，每個執行個體。If the settings properties of the wrapper are intended to be per instance, then should have a unique value for every instance. 建構函式版本可讓您在初始化的唯一字串。The version of the constructor enables you to initialize to a unique string. 相反地，屬性會提供提示給設定提供者來啟用它以有效率且以正確順序的方式保存值。In contrast, the property provides hints to the settings provider to enable it to persist values in an efficient and orderly manner. 類別包含類似屬性，可協助識別的來源事件。The class contains a similar property that helps identify the source of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingsLoaded As SettingsLoadedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於從儲存區擷取應用程式設定之後。

span.span: Occurs after the application settings are retrieved from storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只在初始之後發生的事件`get`存取第一個組態屬性使用，通常透過方法。The event occurs only after the initial `get` access of the first configuration property used, typically through the method. 後續存取會使用本機快取的設定屬性的值。Subsequent accesses use values for the settings property that are cached locally. 和方法將會清除所有快取的值，因此將會再次引發此事件，在後續的屬性存取。The and methods will clear all cached values so this event will be raised again upon subsequent property access.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingsSaving As SettingsSavingEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於值儲存至資料存放區之前。

span.span: Occurs before values are saved to the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件之前它會儲存至其相關聯的資料存放區的應用程式設定屬性的方法。The event is raised by the method before it stores the application settings properties to their associated data store. 相關聯的事件處理常式可以取消此事件。The associated event handler can cancel this event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範類型物件的事件處理常式`FormSettings`，其包裝函式類別衍生自。The following code example shows the event handler for object of type `FormSettings`, which is a wrapper class derived from . 此處理常式會查詢使用者儲存目前的應用程式設定屬性值。The handler queries the user to save the current application settings property values. 完整的程式碼範例會列在類別概觀。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#8)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Upgrade() cil managed

summary.span: 更新應用程式設定，以反映應用程式的最近安裝。

span.span: Updates application settings to reflect a more recent installation of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行兩個動作，以確保平順地轉換至新版的應用程式：The method performs two actions to assure smooth transition to a new version of an application: - 它會通知所有對應的設定提供者包含目的升級的應用程式透過呼叫其方法，假設它們實作介面。It notifies all of the corresponding settings providers of the existence of the upgraded application through a call to their method, assuming they have implemented the interface. 如果設定包裝函式類別標示為不執行此動作。This action is not performed if the settings wrapper class is marked with . - 它會重新載入的所有應用程式設定的值。It reloads the values for all of the application settings. 您可以覆寫的預設行為來實作自訂升級或合併行為。You can override the default behavior of to implement custom upgrading or merging behavior. 使用方法來擷取個別的舊版應用程式的設定值。Use the method to retrieve individual values for a setting for the previous version of the application. 升級的自訂行為的範例包括：Examples of custom upgrade behavior include: - 使用覆寫一個或多個先前的使用者指定值的新原則預設值或先前的預設值。Using new policy defaults that override one or more of the previous user-specified values or previous defaults. - 特別轉換為較新範圍、 不同的設定屬性群組，以及其他與相容的舊值。Special translation of old values to be compatible with newer ranges, a different settings property group, and so on.

span.span: The configuration file could not be parsed.
